plot: A vicious corporation tries to kill and starve the last remaining habitants of the Bronx in order to build their own high-rise developments. A lone long-haired hot-tempered warrior, Trash, is the only obstacle well, him, a psychopathic bomb-maker and his equally psychopathic pre-school son, an annoying activist help him out, by kidnapping &"the President&" (of the corporation), a Richard Dreyfuss look-a-like. Henry Silva plays another psychopathic, this one on the side of the corporations. A favorite movie of Mystery Science Theater 3000 series.   Written by  Jonah Falcon
title: Fuga del Bronx (Los guerreros del Bronx 2)
